doc.after: During the 11th century in the Song Dynasty the Chinese astronomer horologist and mechanical engineer Su Song created a water driven astronomical clock for his clock tower of Kaifeng City It incorporated an escapement mechanism as well as the earliest known endless power transmitting chain drive which drove the armillary sphere
